name: Gravity Warrior
description:
Description
Gravity Warrior - is the world's first real 3D shooter lowpoly.

Unique gameplay, spectacular special effects, professional voice acting, riddles of darkness and hidden rooms.

All this and not only with us, download it right now

**********
Our Team

Programmers
Pavel Kurochkin (https://itch.io/profile/atuj) 
Daniel Evstigneev (https://posimood.itch.io/)

Sound designer
Dmitry Kalinin (https://itch.io/profile/kvoh)

**********
Gameplay instruction

WASD - Basic movement (forward, left, back, right)
RMB - Shoot from right hand ( weapon )
LMB - Special action, change gravity
SpaceBar - jump
P - Pause
Shift - sprint
F - FlashLight

**********
List any content that was created before the jam.
Meshes for barell, weapon, sandbags, stone and boxes
Audio Content (action dynamic music on the background)

**********
Which Engine version did you use to create your entry?
Unreal Engine 4.27
